mdq:check.name: Access Control Rules
mdq:check.description: Check that access control rules exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
global accessControlRules
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
displayNchars = 20
# An access control rule is not present if 'accessControlRules' not in globals() or accessControlRules is None: output = "Access control rules were not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
accessControlRules = mvar.toUnicode(accessControlRules)
if(isinstance(accessControlRules, unicode)): accessControlRules = [accessControlRules]
if (mvar.isBlank(accessControlRules)): output = "The access control rules are blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if access control rules are a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(accessControlRules, unicode)): outstr = accessControlRules.strip() outstr.replace('\n', ' ').replace('\r', '') if(len(outstr) > displayNchars): outstr = u"{}...".format(outstr[:displayNchars]) output = u"The access control rules '{}' were found.".format(outstr) elif (isinstance(accessControlRules, list)): outstr = accessControlRules[0].strip() outstr.replace('\n', ' ').replace('\r', '') if(len(outstr) > displayNchars): outstr = u"{}...".format(outstr[:displayNchars]) output = u"The access control rules '{}' were found.".format(outstr) status = "SUCCESS" return True
